Error 404: Page Not Found It seems that the page that you’re trying to access doesn’t exist. ğŸ˜Ÿ If you’re sure that it exists, chances are it might have been moved to a new link! You may search for it on the home page.

So, Who Am I? Hi there, This is En Shuo Hsu. I come from Taiwan, had my master at UMich(Go Blue!) and currently live at Seattle Area. It’s challenging to leave my home country and start my new life at a really different country. I’m here to share what I learned, saw and feel. Hope some of you can get something useful from my share here.
